title: Covid-19 global updates: Spread of delta variant prompts new restrictions worldwide
content:
1. Covid-19 global updates: Spread of delta variant prompts new restrictions worldwide  The Washington Post
  2. These are the pockets of the US most at risk as the Delta Covid-19 variant spreads, expert says  CNN
  3. The Covid delta variant has 'exploded' in the UK — and it could be a blueprint for the U.S.  CNBC
  4. Opinion | Get Vaccinated. Worry Less About Covid Variants.  The New York Times
  5. Get Ready to Live With Covid's Hassles Forever  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
